Flight training

After completing the task and reaching lowest orbital point, the game suggest we can try to land but the staging controls are unresponsive so no decoupling, no parachutes, no surviving chances

Mun orbiting 101

After selecting a good node, the est. burn is a N/A value so I don't really get the pro-tip about starting burn half this value before reaching node.

The curve of trajectory screws up really easy and the handles are maybe too sensitive. Then when I chose to reset to get a better approach, the node moved to the outskirts of the galaxy, destroying progress.

In regards to the N/A, it happens from time to time. All you can do is go to full throttle really quickly (hit "Z") then immediately cut the throttle to zero (hit "X"). That will allow the computer to recalculate and give you an appropriate burn time.
Thanks for the tip, not very energy-efficient, but useful
